mapper.sql: id, user_id, course_id, ware_id, start_time, end_time, pauseTime, status, create_time, last_modify_time
mapper.select: select count(1) from study_log where user_id = #{userId} and course_id = #{courseId} and ware_id = #{wareId} and (status != 400 and status != 304)
mapper.insert: insert into study_log (id, user_id, course_id, ware_id, start_time, end_time, pauseTime, status, create_time, last_modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wareId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pausetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
